column1: # The observer, Mr Hodgson, recorded readings at the nearby cemetery site for about 30 years before this.
# British Rainfall lists the 1917-1919 Alford/Hodgson records as 'Finsbery Street' - this is not shown on the 1910s rainfall sheet, which is just labelled 'Cemetery'.
# The church and railway directions on the 1910s sheet do not match Finsbury Street or Cemetery locations.
# They indicate a location somewhere in the West Street vicinity, possibly the nearby allotments (TF452760).
# The grid reference for Finsbury Street is given as the main grid reference above.
